sentences.en: But the ploy could backfire by alienating working women.
sentences.cn: 可是这种攻击伎俩可能回让职业妇女反感,而收到反效果.

sentences.en: Christmas should be a time of excitement and wonder, not a cynical marketing ploy.
sentences.cn: 圣诞节应该是兴奋和美妙的时刻，而不该是一种肆无忌惮的营销策略。

sentences.en: His usual ploy is to pretend he’s ill.
Sometimes, changing the subject may be a ploy used by your opponent throw you off course.
sentences.cn: 有时, 改变争论主题是你对手使用的一种让你迷失方向的策略.

sentences.en: Their complaints are not treated as a ploy any more.
sentences.cn: 它们的抱怨现在再也不被视为是一种策略.
